sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of General Electric ( GE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.8%.
Year to date, General Electric has lost about 1.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is American Express ( AXP ), trading down 1.1%.
American Express is lower by about 15.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.8%, and Boeing ( BA ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
